settings.title: FARMERS MARKET PRODUCE
settings.description:
We source seasonal vegetables from family farms.
We'll reach outside of our region when it makes sense, but the majority comes from NY State.

settings.text: 48 HOUR DELIVERY â€” EVERY ORDER SUPPORTS MEALS FOR OUR FOOD INSECURE NEIGHBORS

settings.newsletter--info: Tune in for updates on our menus & mission

settings.title: Chef's Bundle
settings.description: One week of meals and snacks, designed by Chef Anup Joshi. Eat like a restaurant chef at home this week!

settings.slide-tagline: Take the week off from cooking with farm-to-table prepared meal kits designed for quarantine living.

settings.title: FOLLOW US ON INSTA
settings.description: Follow us on IG for recipe tips and updates on our work in the community.

settings.slide-tagline: Seasonal vegetables from family farms.  We'll reach outside of our region when it makes sense, but the majority comes from NY State.
